title: Go Vegetarian Restaurant
description: On the menu are veggie burgers, veggie sausage and chicken strips, sandwiches, faux salmon cakes, salad, shakes. The proteins are all vegan. Could ask for vegan cheese and vegan mayo. Brunch menu on Saturday and Sunday feature dishes like French toast, waffles and chickn, gravy, and tofu scramble. Serves breakfast 9-2pm, lunch and dinner 11am-9pm. Located behind the BB&T Bank, since Sept 2014. Get 10% off discount when you post a dine-in food photo to HappyCow.
